    • Method Detail

      • cmsEditLink

        public String cmsEditLink(org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.standard.HippoBean bean,
                          boolean asComment)
        Create CMS edit link for the bean and return it as either Link URI or HTML Comment. If asComment is true, it returns the link information as HTML comment. Otherwise, it simply returns the link URI.
        Parameters:
        bean - content bean
        asComment - flag whether the link should be serialized as HTML comment or not
        Returns:
        CMS edit link for the bean and return it as either Link URI or HTML Comment

      • cmsEditLinkAsLink

        public String cmsEditLinkAsLink(org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.standard.HippoBean bean)
        Create CMS edit link URI for the bean and return it.
        Parameters:
        bean - content bean
        Returns:
        Create CMS edit link URI for the bean and return it

      • cmsEditLinkAsComment

        public String cmsEditLinkAsComment(org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.standard.HippoBean bean)
        Create CMS edit link for the bean and return it as HTML Comment.
        Parameters:
        bean - content bean
        Returns:
        CMS edit link for the bean and return it as HTML Comment
